availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jordan W. Bond (Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Anderson County native. Married to Mildred A. Martin Bond in Anderson County on September 24, 1857. Father of Lucy J. Bond. Resident of Anderson County in 1850. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Anderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 199A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 108.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 29A.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), film no. 001550673, p. 1007.
Find A Grave, "Jordan W. Bond (1831-1909)," Memorial #73440187, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/73440187 (accessed September 10, 2018).
